author: andreas
content:
Interesting. For me it's completely irrelevant who he is, what he's done etc. I reality of course I don't know. He just passed by, I was lucky to have been prepared anyway, I snapped two shots and this is the better.

For me this image has kind of a longing in it. Thus the title. But then, it's nice to see that it sparks completely different thoughts in other people ðŸ™‚
